MemberSignature.Usage: new Microsoft.ML.Runtime.TimeSeriesProcessing.SsaChangePointEstimator (env, inputColumn, outputColumn, confidence, changeHistoryLength, trainingWindowSize, seasonalityWindowSize, errorFunction, martingale, eps)

Docs.param: The confidence for change point detection in the range [0, 100].
The size of the sliding window for computing the p-value.
The number of points from the beginning of the sequence used for training.
An upper bound on the largest relevant seasonality in the input time-series.
The function used to compute the error between the expected and the observed value.
The epsilon parameter for the Power martingale.
Docs.remarks: Example code can be found by searching for SsaChangePointDetector in ML.NET.
